issue.subject: Upload large file size
issue.description:
In the current version of the shop, it is not possible to upload a file > 999 Mo. 

It could be possible using this kind of librairie : http://javascript.developpez.com/telecharger/detail/id/4130/Upload-de-fichiers-Ajax-reprise-d-upload-informations-temps-reel-fonctions-et-styles-evenementiels-crop-et-redimensions-d-images

journals.notes:
Hi Thomas !

I just tested with 2116517843 Bytes file (~2GB) without any problems on my winbox with current 4.4 branch.

Maybe your problem comes from your php @upload_max_filesize@ parameter (php.ini) ?
